sys_ux_data_broker_transform.description: Required because the buttons prop is true to disable and false to enable, and also to fetch the Custom portal settings page text
sys_ux_data_broker_transform.name: Boolean reversal transform

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_d76f6fa676f74110de49a672f2418f19
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_708650_pfm.Boolean reversal transform</api_name><description>Required because the buttons prop is true to disable and false to enable, and also to fetch the Custom portal settings page text</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Boolean reversal transform</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "broker",
    "label": "GraphQL Broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""},{"message":"GraphQL Broker","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	var modelData = input.broker.data.GlideRecord_Query.sys_properties._results[0].value.value;
	var mfa = {};
	if(modelData == "false"){
		mfa.value = "true";
		mfa.text = gs.getMessage("Please enable Multi-factor authentication on the instance.");
	}
	else{
		mfa.value = "false";
		mfa.text = gs.getMessage("Configure Multi-factor authentication by clicking the button below");
	}
	return mfa;
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-03 17:29:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>d76f6fa676f74110de49a672f2418f19</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Boolean reversal transform</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PFM" source="x_708650_pfm">756d8d432f83301036b3d6c6f699b681</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PFM">756d8d432f83301036b3d6c6f699b681</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_d76f6fa676f74110de49a672f2418f19</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-03 17:29:27</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform></record_update>
